amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to enforce section 221 of title 13, United States Code, with respect to the survey, conducted by the Secretary of Commerce, commonly referred to as the "American Community Survey".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce section 221 of title 13, United States Code, with respect to the survey, conducted by the Secretary of Commerce, commonly referred to as the "American Community Survey".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
